attributes.action: Send back and keep out immigrants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We no longer want to take a back seat to the immigrants. They are taking over our country, taking our jobs, our houses, schools, money, did you know that if they have more than 1 wife they can claim benifits for all of them, is that right, i think not! they get more out of our goverment than us and our parents have ever had.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
